text:
This bug report has been raised for enabling multile test elements in a
test-plan to be copy-pasted or cut-pasted. Currently this is not supported. This
bug is similar to Bug# 29754.

I have fixed the issue and will be submitting a patch shortly.

regards,
Praveen
creator: kumarp@in.ibm.com
kumarp@in.ibm.com

creator: sebb@apache.org
text:
Thanks for the patches; applied to CVS release 2.0.

BTW, Eclipse did not like the patches, so they had to be applied by hand.
I think this is because the headers (with the file details) were missing.
